title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) to use Ollama models as LLM or embedder.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with model management, chats, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for easier scripting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose snippets for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight React chat app that talks to Ollama via the OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Experimental RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider and facade wrapping the Ollama REST API for PHP projects.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter repo exposing an OpenAI-like chat completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6 and Python.
